title: Woman Guard

verbs: To protect; to keep from harm or injury.
Maintain in safety from injury, harm, or danger
To keep safe; to defend; to guard; to prevent harm coming to.
To keep something or someone safe or prevent harm coming to someone or something.
To protect from danger; to secure against surprise, attack, or injury; to keep in safety; to defend.
To prevent, to keep (from doing something).
To safeguard a resource from attack or loss.
nouns: A woman is a female human.
An animal of the sex that produces eggs.
An adult human member of the sex that produces ova and bears young.
An adult female person (as opposed to a man)
A person who, or thing that, protects or watches over something.
Person who or thing that protects something.
A person who keeps watch over something or someone
A person who protects or watches over something.

description: The female version of the üíÇ Guardsman emoji.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the woman guard emoji presents a strong, professional figure with a confident posture, clad in a crisp, dark uniform that highlights Apple's characteristic smooth gradients and realistic lighting. Her expression is serious and alert, conveying vigilance and authority with subtle facial nuances. The details, from the cap to the slight sheen on the fabric, are rendered with Apple's signature 3D depth and soft, rounded edges, making her an emblem of security and protection in digital communication.
